title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 May 2016 - XWiki
content:
<lkrejci> has quit

07:16 <M-yflory> has quit

07:16 <M-jsimard> has quit

08:21 <cjd> has quit  
08:26 <gene> has quit  
08:27 <gene> has joined #xwiki  
08:48 <acotiuga> Hello!  
08:50 <acotiuga> I have 2 branches on Forum Application master (depending on XWiki 7.2) and stable-1.x (depending on XWiki 6.4.4). Running mvn clean install -Pintegration-tests on master will launch the tests for 6.4.4.  
08:57 <acotiuga> has quit  
09:14 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:45 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
09:59 <cjd> has quit  
10:09 <vmassol> good morning, how is the release doing? :)  
10:13 <mflorea> has quit  
10:20 <vmassol> come back marius! :)  
10:20 <vmassol> we need you!  
10:29 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <vmassol> mflorea: hi, any status for the release? anything blocking where I could help?  
10:39 <vmassol> I see lots of yellow and red on ci  
10:39 <vmassol> only yellow for 8.1 branch  
10:39 <mflorea> I'm checking the ci to see if there's any real problem and then I can start the maven realease  
10:40 <mflorea> looks like sendTextMail is not fixed http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform\_Quality-8.1.x/18/testReport/  
10:40 <mflorea> still Couldnt start at least one of the mail services.  
10:40 <vmassol> indeed...  
10:40 <vmassol> you could skip it for the release though  
10:40 <mflorea> ok  
10:41 <vmassol> since it's passing locally  
10:52 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
11:09 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:26 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:38 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki

11:59 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki

12:25 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:25 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
12:33 <tmortagne> mflorea: can we commit in 8.1 branch ?  
12:35 <mflorea> tmortagne: now you can  
12:35 <tmortagne> ok thanks  
12:46 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:08 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:30 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:54 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:30 <lucaa> has quit  
14:30 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:41 <vmassol> now we need to understand how come the language is changed on playground  
14:43 <mflorea> vmassol: I see a few "Deprecated usage of method [com.xpn.xwiki.api.XWiki.getConfiguredSyntaxes]" warnings in the 8.2-SNAPSHOT log  
14:44 <vmassol> mflorea: in your local instnace?  
14:44 <vmassol> any idea from the log from what page it's coming from?  
14:45 <vmassol> actually I found some by searching in the code base  
14:45 <mflorea> XWikiSyntax and DocumentInformation pane, you can also check the WebStandards tests for master, some are failing because there is this warning in the log  
14:45 <vmassol> fixiing them  
14:46 <vmassol> apparently webprefences.xml  
14:46 <vmassol> hmm DocumentInformation shouldn't have this  
14:46 <vmassol> since it's now using $services.rendering.getConfiguredSyntaxes()  
14:47 <vmassol> XWikiSyntax indeed  
14:47 <mflorea> re XWikiSyntax, the syntax drop down is empty, probably because of this  
14:48 <vmassol> it's empty because I have removed any default  
14:48 <vmassol> yes using the new api would fix it  
15:12 <vmassol> fixed WebPreferences, moving to XWikiSyntax now  
15:13 <msmeria> has quit  
15:32 <vmassol> I now need to update all the WebPreferences we have in our SCM...  
15:46 <vmassol> mflorea: should be ok now  
15:46 <vmassol> ah need to check enterprise too  
15:47 <vmassol> nothing to update in enterprise apparently  
15:48 <vmassol> mflorea: let me know if you see more problems!  
15:48 <vmassol> thx  
15:48 <mflorea> sure  
15:50 <acotiuga> I got [ERROR] Failed to execute goal on project application-forum-test-pageobjects: Could not resolve dependencies for project org.xwiki.contrib.forum:application-forum-test-pageobjects:jar:2.0.2-SNAPSHOT: Could not find artifact org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-test:jar:7.4 in xwiki-releases (http://nexus.xwiki.org/nexus/content/groups/public)  
15:50 <acotiuga> I can see that 7.2 is the last cycle with .jar file  
15:50 <vmassol> yep  
15:50 <vmassol> it's been split into 2  
15:51 <vmassol> 3 actually  
15:51 <vmassol> see https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-test  
15:51 <vmassol> so you need to update your pom  
15:51 <vmassol> you probably want \*-test-ui  
15:52 <acotiuga> In my project I have \*-test and -ui  
15:52 <vmassol> again -test is wrong  
15:52 <vmassol> doesn't exist  
15:53 <vmassol> check the link I gave above  
16:42 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:42 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:50 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
16:55 <lkrejci> has quit  
16:56 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
17:40 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
18:39 <lucaa> hello xwikiers  
18:39 <lucaa> I am trying to build the trunk  
18:39 <lucaa> actually, not even  
18:39 <lucaa> just trying to run mvn xar:format on a couple of pages in a platform module  
18:40 <lucaa> and I don't manage to  
18:40 <lucaa> what version of java should I be using? 1.8 or 1.7?  
18:40 <vmassol> for master you need java 8  
18:41 <lucaa> ok, can this be a an openjdk java, or it must absolutely be a sun java?  
18:41 <vmassol> can be any java8  
18:41 <vmassol> afaik  
18:41 <lucaa> format failed: Plugin com.mycila:license-maven-plugin:2.11 or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: Could not find artifact com.sun:tools:jar:1.7.0 at specified path /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre/../lib/tools.jar -> [Hel  
18:41 <lucaa> maybe I am using the wrong maven...  
18:41 <lucaa> I have maven 3.3.3  
18:42 <mflorea> has quit  
18:42 <lucaa> well, the fact that it's looking for a com.sun.tools something seems to me like it does not work with any java...  
18:43 <lucaa> I mean, it would absolutely expect a sun one, somehow  
18:43 <lucaa> I have maven 3.3.3, should I be having another maven?  
18:43 <lucaa> is anyone here building master with an openjdk java successfully?  
18:48 <tmortagne> has quit  
18:49 <vmassol> lucaa: I don't know. I don't remember this issue being reported. But it does look like some jdk issue indeed. I use oracle jdk on my side  
18:50 <vmassol> looks like a bug of the license plugin  
18:56 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
19:08 <evalica> has quit  
19:10 <lucaa> vmassol: I installed a java 8 from oracle and now my maven command is passing just fine  
19:11 <Enygma`> has quit  
19:15 <vmassol> ok good to know  
19:15 <vmassol> might be worth raising as a jira  
19:16 <vmassol> at the very least we need to mention it on the Building page  
19:37 <vmassol> has quit
